name: Fishing Planet - Golden Starter Pack
description:
Hey there, boys and girls! Here’s a fantastic opportunity to INSTANTLY get full access to 17 of Fishing Planet’s angling destinations! Not only do you get all the awesome Advanced & Deluxe tackle in their Golden edition, but also the most powerful state-or-the art exclusively Golden fishing equipment: including TEN monstrously powerful Golden Edition rod and reel combos, a set of prime quality Golden Edition fishing apparel and the awesome cherry-on-top Golden Kayak - a durable and speedy companion for your offshore fishing adventures! Sound good? How about FULL ACCESS to 17 WATERWAYS in North America and Europe with 30 Day Pond Passes, complemented by all corresponding Advanced Fishing Licenses! Not to mentions Credits, BaitCoins and a MONTH of Premium!

Golden Starter Pack includes: * 100 000 CREDITS * 100 BAITCOINS * 30-DAY PREMIUM * 10 Marker Buoys * 1 Storage Box (200 Slots) * 10 Tackle Setups * 10 Recipe Slots

RODS ‘N REELS Rods: * Magfin™ NightFeather™ Golden Edition - Length: 6' 6"" (2 m); Lure Weight: 1/28–1/3 Oz. (1–9 g); Power: Ultralight; Line Weight: 3–10 Lb. (1.5–4.5 kg); Action: Fast * UL-CHUBER™ AllRound™ Golden Edition - Length: 12' 10"" (3.9 m); Casting Weight: 1 3/7 – 4 2/7 Oz. (40–120 g); Power: Heavy; Line Weight: 3–11 Lb. (1.5–4.5 kg); Action: Moderate; Quiver Tips: 1 Oz., 2 Oz., 3 Oz. * Garry Scott™ GoldenTroy™ - Length: 23' (7 m); Line Weight: 3–13 Lb. (1.5–6.0 kg); Action: Mod Fast * UL-CHUBER™ Golden Alli™ - Length: 13' 10" (4.2 m); Casting Weight: 3 1/28 – 6 1/4 Oz. (85–175 g); Power: X Heavy; Line Weight: 6.5–18.5 Lb. (3–8.5 kg); Action: Fast; Quiver Tips: 3 Oz., 4 Oz., 5 Oz. * Magfin™ LuxCaster™ Golden Edition - Length: 7' 3"" (2.2 m); Lure Weight: 3/8-1 3/7 Oz. (10–40 g); Power: Heavy; Line Weight: 7.5–23 Lb. (3.5–10.5 kg); Action: Fast * RIVERTEX™ Loki™ Golden Edition - Length: 8' 10" (2.7 m); Lure Weight: 7/8 – 2 1/2 Oz. (25–70 g); Power: Heavy; Line Weight: 7–26.5 Lb. (4–12 kg); Action: Moderate * Garry Scott™ Brutus™ Golden Edition - Length: 10' 10" (3.3 m); Line Weight: 11–34 Lb. (5–15.5 kg); Action: Mod Fast * UL-CHUBER™ Heavy Chaser™ Golden Edition - Length: 9' 10" (3.0 m); Casting Weight: 6 – 8 4/5 Oz. (170–250 g); Power: X Heavy; Line Weight: 22– 56.2 lb ( 10–25.5 kg); Action: Moderate * RIVERTEX™ Golden Zeus™ - Length: 8' 2" (2.5 m); Lure Weight: 5/8 – 2 Oz. (18–56 g); Power: X-Heavy; Line Weight: 15 – 42 lb (7–19.5 kg); Action: Mod Fast * RIVERTEX™ CosmoCast™ Golden Edition - Length: 9' 6" (2.9 m); Lure Weight: 1 1/10 – 2 5/8 Oz. (30–75 g); Power: X Heavy; Line Weight: 30.8–62.8 Lb (14–28,5 kg); Action: Mod Fast Reels: * Magfin™ EspiraSlim™ Golden Edition - Ratio: 5.4:1; Recovery: 31.5"" (80 cm); Capacity: mono 3/100 (0.25/100), braid 6/125 (0.2/125); Max Drag: 8 Lb. (28 kg); Ball Bearings: 5+1; Weight: 12.3 Oz. (350 g); Brake: centrifugal

EQUIPMENT * GarryScott™ Golden Angler Cap - Tackles: 2 * MagFin™ Golden Angler Jacket - Tackles: 35; Lines: 4 * UL-CHUBER Golden Box™ - Tackles: 90; Lines: 7 Chum Components: 20 * MagFin™ Golden Rod Case - Rods: 7 * UL-CHUBER™ Golden Rod Stand - Rod Slot: 3; Stand Count: 1; Bite Alarm: Yes * GarryScott™ FishFort XL Plus Keepnet - Max Single Fish Weight: 110 Lb. (50 kg); Total Fish Weight: 330 Lb. (150 kg); Fish-Friendly: yes

KAYAKS * Golden Kayak™ - Specifications: Length: 10 ft 4 in (3.15 m); Width: 35 in (88.9 cm); Weight: 62 lb (35 kg); Max Speed: 6 mph (9 kmh); Passenger capacity: 1

POND PASSES (30 days): * Lesní Víla Fishery (Czech) * Mudwater River (Missouri) * Emerald Lake (New York) * Rocky Lake (Colorado) * Neherrin River (North Carolina) * Ghent–Terneuzen Canal (Netherlands) * Falcon Lake (Oregon) * Everglades (Florida) * White Moose Lake (Alberta) * Tiber River (Italy) * Quanchkin Lake (Louisiana) * Saint-Croix Lake (Michigan) * San Joaquin Delta (California) * Kaniq Creek (Alaska) * Sander Baggersee Lake (Germany) * Akhtuba River (Russia)

FISHING LICENSES (30 days): * Advanced Czech License * Advanced Missouri License * Advanced New York License * Advanced Colorado License * Advanced North Carolina License * Advanced Netherlands License * Advanced Oregon License * Advanced Florida License * Advanced Texas License * Advanced Alberta License * Advanced Italy License * Advanced Louisiana License * Advanced Michigan License * Advanced California License * Advanced Alaska License * Advanced Germany License * Advanced Russia License
